comments:
HierarchyResourceFactoryImpl does not support loading of Query resources.

The following Query XMI file cannot be loaded due to an exception while trying 
to create an EAttribute object.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <HierarchyExtensions:SimpleSearchQuery xmi:version="2.0" 
xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-
instance" 
xmlns:HierarchyExtensions="http://www.eclipse.org/hyades/models/hierarchy-
extensions.xmi" name="FilterTwo">
 <outputElements>
 <type 
href="http://www.eclipse.org/hyades/models/cbe.xmi#//CBECommonBaseEvent"/>
 </outputElements>
 <whereExpression xsi:type="HierarchyExtensions:LogicalExpression" 
operator="AND">
 <arguments xsi:type="HierarchyExtensions:BinaryExpression" operator="EQ">
 <leftOperand>
 <feature xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" 
href="http://www.eclipse.org/hyades/models/cbe.xmi#//CBECommonBaseEvent/severit
y"/>
 </leftOperand>
 <rightOperands rawValue="warning"/>
 </arguments>
 </whereExpression>
 </HierarchyExtensions:SimpleSearchQuery>

The SAX XMI Handler cannot find a factory to load EAttribute which results in 
the following exception:

Marius, could you target this one to an iteration? Thanks.
Please assign this to an iteration
Assigning to 3.3 i3 since it is opened against Hyades

The current implementation of that resource doesn't support yet the filtering
model, you can use a simple XMI resource for that side of the model.

Please open a feature if you feel that is required.
